original: Lindberg, Alvar Evert, läroverksadjunkt, Värnamo, f. 18/9/06 i Malmö av Oskar L. o. Märta Persson. G. 41 m. lärov:adj. Birgit Wennström. Barn: Åke f. 42, Lars 44. — Stud:ex. i Norrköp. 25, fil. mag. i Upps. 31, provar v. Gbgs fo’lksk:sem. 40. E. o. lär. v. Jämtl. 1. folkhögsk. 31-32, tim-lär. v. Härnösands tekn. gymn. 34-35, e. lär. där 35-38, e. adj. i Vadstena 38-39, i Halmstad 39, e. o. adj. i Kristinehamn 40-41, adj. i modersm. o. eng. v. Värnamo samrealsk. sed. 41. Resor t. Tyskl. 35 o. 37, Eng]. 38.
translated: Lindberg, Alvar Evert, high school teacher, Värnamo, b. 18/9/06 in Malmö to Oskar L. and Märta Persson. Married in 1941 to high school teacher Birgit Wennström. Children: Åke b. 1942, Lars b. 1944. Completed high school exam in Norrköping in 1925, obtained a Bachelor of Arts degree in Uppsala in 1931, took a teaching course at Gothenburg's elementary school seminar in 1940. Served as temporary and assistant teacher at Jämtland's folk high school from 1931-1932, part-time teacher at Härnösand's technical gymnasium in 1934-1935, permanent teacher there from 1935-1938, assistant teacher in Vadstena in 1938-1939, in Halmstad in 1939, temporary and assistant teacher in Kristinehamn in 1940-1941, and has been a teacher of the native and English language at Värnamo's secondary school since 1941. Traveled to Germany in 1935 and 1937, to England in 1938.
